I have always had a hard time finding dresses that are comfortable, flattering, and also fashionable. This dress hits all of those (plus, it's also affordable!). I live in Tampa, FL, where it's hot and humid most of the year, so I love how the fabric is lightweight but not too thin. I like how the dress gives you a waistline without clinging to the belly area. I like the slightly longer sleeves (keeps me from getting too cold if I step into the A/C for a while!). I also really like that the wrap neckline is sexy but isn't too deep, making the dress appropriate for family settings.  The only two possible gripes I have with this dress is that it falls a bit shorter on me than I personally prefer (about 3" above my knees), which makes it so I have to be mindful if it's windy. The second gripe is that the fabric and stitching feel a little bit cheap. But you get what you pay for!  Overall, I am very happy with this dress, and I'm thinking about purchasing another! For reference, I bought a size large, I'm 5'8'', my weight is 170 lbs., and my bust/waist/hip measurements are 38", 33", and 43", respectively.

I ordered about 6 different dresses and this was one of them. It was the last one I tried on. By then I was over it... Until I looked in the mirror. This dress cinches the mid-section so well and has enough fabric on the bottom to flare out just right. It is flattering to the top. I received so many compliments. The only caveat is the button used at the top it pulls and causes that weird "pulling button peep hole" thing that happens on shirts. I just unbuttoned it and it looked great. I'm 5'9" and wear a size L/ XL. I ordered the XL because I am top heavy 38DDD/F and usually the v cut is too deep or not enough coverage on smaller sizes and this fit great. I thought the price was a little higher then most dresses in this category but not out of budget by any means.

I bought this as a last minute “need a dress for a wedding so let me at least try this” I had very low expectations considering the price, but this dress was great! Low cut but not so low that I couldn’t chase my children around or dance in it. The tummy area was form fitting (nicely like shape wear) and the bottom was flowy and so fun! Hit at the knee so it was short but not too short. Very flirty and cute little dress!

I am the type of person that does not like dresses. I am constantly looking for dresses that I can wear that are flattering, as well as comfortable. That is very hard to find with my curvy figure. I also find it hard to find a dress that covers my upper arms Like I like without looking frumpy. The dress is so cute, it is so great on my curves, flatters my waist, and covers my upper arms perfectly. It was so comfortable to wear that I actually would wear it in times that I didn’t need to wear a dress, which typically I did not put on a dress unless I absolutely have to.  I love the material, it does not cling to parts of my body that I do not want to, it’s really super cute. Having pockets is such a huge bonus, obviously that is one of the biggest downsides to wearing a dress. This one solves that problem, and you cannot even tell it has pockets.
Happily surprised. This dress fit so well and looks great.
